name: brightness_setMin
description: This function is used to set the brightness of a smart home appliance or place to its minimum level.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the brightness.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to perform on multiple devices.
